Articles.Content:
Jeff Bezos (*Amazon's founder*) has been pulling old Apollo series rocket parts up from the ocean bottom for preservation. The Apollo 11 parts are to be sent to the **Smithsonian Air And Space Museum** ... something to look forward to. Other parts from other missions will go to other locations (*presumably museums*). I'm sure when the time comes there will be more news on this in the media.

For now, the latest...

[http://io9.com/jeff-bezos-recovered-apollo-rocket-parts-have-been-pres-1722897200](https://io9.com/jeff-bezos-recovered-apollo-rocket-parts-have-been-pres-1722897200)
